verses.verse: And it was told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8714><s%> Yo'av <S%H3097><s%>, Behold, the king <S%H4428><s%> weepeth <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and mourneth <S%H56><s%> <S%H8691><s%> for Avshalom <S%H53><s%>.

And the victory <S%H8668><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> was turned into mourning <S%H60><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>: for the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> how the king <S%H4428><s%> was grieved <S%H6087><s%> <S%H8738><s%> for his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> gat <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them by stealth <S%H1589><s%> <S%H8691><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, as people <S%H5971><s%> being ashamed <S%H3637><s%> <S%H8737><s%> steal away <S%H1589><s%> <S%H8691><s%> when they flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%>.

But the king <S%H4428><s%> covered <S%H3813><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, O my son <S%H1121><s%> Avshalom <S%H53><s%>, O Avshalom <S%H53><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%> !

And Yo'av <S%H3097><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thou hast shamed <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8689><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of all thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, which this day <S%H3117><s%> have saved <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%>, and the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and of thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy wives <S%H802><s%>, and the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy concubines <S%H6370><s%>;

In that thou lovest <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thine enemies <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and hatest <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy friends <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%>. For thou hast declared <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, that thou regardest neither princes <S%H8269><s%> nor servants <S%H5650><s%>: for this day <S%H3117><s%> I perceive <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that if <S%H3863><s%> Avshalom <S%H53><s%> had lived <S%H2416><s%>, and all we had died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, then it had pleased thee well <S%H3477><s%> <S%H5869><s%>.

Now therefore arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> comfortably <S%H3820><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>: for I swear <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by the YY <S%H3068><s%>, if thou go not forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, there will not tarry <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with thee this night <S%H3915><s%>: and that will be worse <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee than all the evil <S%H7451><s%> that befell <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee from thy youth <S%H5271><s%> until now.

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>. And they told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, the king <S%H4428><s%> doth sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>: for Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> had fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his tent <S%H168><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> were at strife <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8737><s%> throughout all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The king <S%H4428><s%> saved <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> us out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of our enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and he delivered <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8765><s%> us out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; and now he is fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> for Avshalom <S%H53><s%>.

And Avshalom <S%H53><s%>, whom we anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over us, is dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%>. Now therefore why speak <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8688><s%> ye not a word of bringing <S%H7725><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> ?

And king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Zadok <S%H6659><s%> and to Evyatar <S%H54><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Why are ye the last <S%H314><s%> to bring <S%H7725><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>? seeing the speech <S%H1697><s%> of all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>, even to his house <S%H1004><s%>.

Ye are my brethren <S%H251><s%>, ye are my bones <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh <S%H1320><s%>: wherefore then are ye the last <S%H314><s%> to bring back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> ?

And say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye to Amasa <S%H6021><s%>, Art thou not of my bone <S%H6106><s%>, and of my flesh <S%H1320><s%>? 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so to me, and more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> also, if thou be not captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me continually <S%H3117><s%> in the room <S%H8478><s%> of Yo'av <S%H3097><s%>.

And he bowed <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the heart <S%H3824><s%> of all the men <S%H376><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, even as the heart of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; so that they sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this word unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou, and all thy servants <S%H5650><s%>.

So the king <S%H4428><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yarden <S%H3383><s%>. And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, to conduct <S%H5674><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

And Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gera <S%H1617><s%>, a Benjamite <S%H1145><s%>, which was of Bahurim <S%H980><s%>, hasted <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8762><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the men <S%H376><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>.

And there were a thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1145><s%> with him, and Ziba <S%H6717><s%> the servant <S%H5288><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and his fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and his twenty <S%H6242><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> with him; and they went over <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And there went over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a ferry boat <S%H5679><s%> to carry over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> household <S%H1004><s%>, and to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> what he thought <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>. And Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gera <S%H1617><s%> fell down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, as he was come over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>;

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, Let not my lord <S%H113><s%> impute <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> unto me, neither do thou remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which thy servant <S%H5650><s%> did perversely <S%H5753><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, that the king <S%H4428><s%> should take <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it to his heart <S%H3820><s%>.

For thy servant <S%H5650><s%> doth know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: therefore, behold, I am come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> of all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> to go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.

But Abishai <S%H52><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of TZ'ruyah <S%H6870><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Shall not Shimei <S%H8096><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%> for this, because he cursed <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> anointed <S%H4899><s%> ?

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What have I to do with you, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of TZ'ruyah <S%H6870><s%>, that ye should this day <S%H3117><s%> be adversaries <S%H7854><s%> unto me? shall there any man <S%H376><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>? for do not I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am this day <S%H3117><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

Therefore the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Shimei <S%H8096><s%>, Thou shalt not die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. And the king <S%H4428><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him.

And M'fivoshet <S%H4648><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, and had neither <S%H3808><s%> dressed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%>, nor trimmed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his beard <S%H8222><s%>, nor washed <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, from the day <S%H3117><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> again in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And it came to pass, when he was come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, that the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Wherefore wentest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not thou with me, M'fivoshet <S%H4648><s%> ?

And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, My lord <S%H113><s%>, O king <S%H4428><s%>, my servant <S%H5650><s%> deceived <S%H7411><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: for thy servant <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will saddle <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me an ass <S%H2543><s%>, that I may ride <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereon, and go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>; because thy servant <S%H5650><s%> is lame <S%H6455><s%>.

And he hath slandered <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>; but my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> is as an angel <S%H4397><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> therefore what is good <S%H2896><s%> in thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

For all of my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> were but <S%H3808><s%> dead <S%H4194><s%> men <S%H582><s%> before my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>: yet didst thou set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> among them that did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at thine own table <S%H7979><s%>. What right <S%H6666><s%> therefore have <S%H3426><s%> I yet to cry <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8800><s%> any more unto the king <S%H4428><s%> ?

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Why speakest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thou any more of thy matters <S%H1697><s%>? I have said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Thou and Ziba <S%H6717><s%> divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H7704><s%>.

And M'fivoshet <S%H4648><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, Yea, let him take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all, forasmuch <S%H310><s%> as <S%H834><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> is come again <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> unto his own house <S%H1004><s%>.

And Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> the Gil`adi <S%H1569><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Rogelim <S%H7274><s%>, and went over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%>, to conduct <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%> him over Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

Now Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> was a very <S%H3966><s%> aged <S%H2204><s%> <S%H8804><s%> man, even fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>: and he had provided the king <S%H4428><s%> of sustenance <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8773><s%> while he lay <S%H7871><s%> at Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%>; for he was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Barzillai <S%H1271><s%>, Come thou over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with me, and I will feed <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8773><s%> thee with me in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, How long <S%H3117><s%> have I to live <S%H8141><s%> <S%H2416><s%>, that I should go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%> unto Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> ?

I am this day <S%H3117><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>: and can I discern <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> between good <S%H2896><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>? can thy servant <S%H5650><s%> taste <S%H2938><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> or what <S%H834><s%> I drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? can I hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any more the voice <S%H6963><s%> of singing men <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and singing women <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? wherefore then should thy servant <S%H5650><s%> be yet a burden <S%H4853><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> ?

Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> will go <S%H5674><s%> a little way <S%H4592><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%>: and why should the king <S%H4428><s%> recompense <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it me with such a reward <S%H1578><s%> ?

Let thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, I pray thee, turn back again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that I may die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in mine own city <S%H5892><s%>, and be buried by the grave <S%H6913><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> and of my mother <S%H517><s%>. But behold thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Chimham <S%H3643><s%>; let him go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>; and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to him what shall seem good <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%> unto thee.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Chimham <S%H3643><s%> shall go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over with me, and I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him that which shall seem good <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%> unto thee: and whatsoever thou shalt require <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of me, that will I do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for thee.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> went over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>. And when the king <S%H4428><s%> was come over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Barzillai <S%H1271><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him; and he returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his own place <S%H4725><s%>.
